message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation impact on me.
I'm willing to split it closer to 50/50, but I'll need a better share considering the inflation hits us both, albeit at different rates. Let's be reasonable.
Bob, my turn to counter. We're losing money with every round, so let's settle this. I'll take a slight hit from my previous offer, but it's still fair considering the inflation difference.
